text: Jya avastheta tumhi ahata, tyaca avastheta, allaha imanadharakanna sodanara nahi, joparyanta pavitra ani apavitra vegavegale na karila, ani allaha asahi nahi ki tumhala aparoksadvare sucita karila, parantu allaha apalya paigambarammadhuna jyaci icchito nivada karato. Yastava tumhi allahavara ani tyacya paigambaranvara imana rakha. Jara tumhi imana rakhala ani aparadhampasuna alipta rahala tara tumacyasathi phara motha mobadala ahe
